name: Banking Customer Onboarding - Advanced (with Preserve Structure)

parameters.content:
## üîç Advanced PII Processing

**This workflow uses `preserveStructure: true`**

### What this enables:
- **Original data preserved** - You can see both before and after
- **Audit trail** - Keep original for compliance reporting
- **Debugging** - Compare what was detected vs censored
- **Flexible output** - Use original or censored data as needed

### Data Structure:
```json
{
  "name": "John Smith",        // Original preserved
  "ssn": "123-45-6789",       // Original preserved
  "censored": {                // Censored version added
    "name": "‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà",
    "ssn": "‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà-‚ñà‚ñà-‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà"
  }
}
```

**Perfect for:** Compliance workflows, audit trails, debugging PII detection

string.name: message
string.value: ‚úÖ Advanced Processing Complete - Both original and censored data available
